coll-book_creator_intro: <big>With the ''collection creator'' you can create a collection containing wiki pages of your choice. You can export the collection in different formats (for example PDF or ODF) or order a printed copy.</big>
coll-book_creator_help: See [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|the help page about collection]] for more information.
coll-book_creator_disable_text: ''collection creator'' will be disabled and the collection you are working on will be removed.
coll-unknown_subpage_text: This subpage of [[Special:Book|Collection]] does not exist.
coll-couldnotaddarticle_msg: The wiki page could not be added.
coll-couldnotremovearticle_msg: The wiki page could not be removed.
coll-noscript_text:
JavaScript is required!

Your browser does not support JavaScript or JavaScript has been turned off. This page will not work correctly, unless JavaScript is enabled.
coll-download_text: To download your collection choose a format and click the button.
coll-download_as_text: To download your collection in $1 format click the button.
coll-drag_and_drop: Use drag & drop to reorder wiki pages and subcollections
coll-notitle_msg: The title of the page could not be determined.
coll-request_failed_msg: There was an error while attempting to render your collection.
coll-mwserve_failed_msg: An error occurred on the render server: <nowiki>$1</nowiki>
coll-save_collection_text: Choose a storage location for your collection:
coll-login_to_save: If you want to save collections for later use, please [[Special:UserLogin|log in or create an account]].
coll-save_category: All saved collections are added to the category [[:Category:{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}|{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}]].
coll-overwrite_text:
A page with the name [[:$1]] already exists.
Do you want it to be replaced with your collection?
coll-load_overwrite_text:
You already have some pages in your collection.
Do you want to overwrite your current collection, append the new content, or cancel loading this collection?
coll-limit_exceeded_text:
Your collection is too big.
No more pages can be added.
coll-rendering_text:
Please wait while the document is being generated.

Progress: $1% $2

This page should automatically refresh every few seconds. If this does not work, please press your browser's refresh button.
coll-rendering_finished_text: The document file has been generated. [$1 Download the file] to your computer. Notes: * Not satisfied with the output? See [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|the help page about collections]] for possibilities to improve it.
coll-rendering_failed_text:
Generation of the document file has failed.

$1
coll-download_notfound_text:
The file you are trying to download does not exist:
Maybe it has been deleted and needs to be regenerated.
coll-download_failed_text: There was an error when downloading the file: $1
coll-is_cached: • A cached version of the document has been found, so no rendering was necessary. [$1 Force re-rendering].
coll-excluded-templates: * Templates in category [[:Category:$1|$1]] have been excluded.
coll-blacklisted-templates: * Templates on blacklist [[:$1]] have been excluded.
coll-book_text: Get a printed book from our print-on-demand partner.
coll-invalid_podpartner_msg:
The supplied POD partner is invalid.
Please contact your MediaWiki administrator.
coll-suggest_intro_text:
Suggestions are based on the current set of wiki pages in your collection.
The list is updated whenever you click on the add or remove buttons.
coll-suggest_ban_tooltip: Remove this page from the list of suggestions
coll-suggest_article_ban: Page $1 has been removed from the suggestions ($2).
coll-suggest_article_add: Page $1 has been added to your collection ($2).
coll-suggest_article_remove: Page $1 has been removed from your collection ($2).
coll-load_local_book: Click OK to continue with your collection %TITLE% which contains %NUMPAGES% wiki pages. Click Cancel to delete it and start with an empty collection.
coll-create_a_book_tooltip: Create a colleciton or page collection
coll-download_as_tooltip: Download a $1 version of this wiki page
coll-add_linked_article: Add linked wiki page to your collection
coll-remove_linked_article: Remove linked wiki page from your collection
coll-add_category: Add this category to your collection
coll-add_category_tooltip: Add all wiki pages in this category to your collection
coll-add_this_page: Add this page to your collection
coll-add_page_tooltip: Add the current wiki page to your collection
coll-clear_collection_confirm: Do you really want to completely clear your collection?
coll-clear_collection_tooltip: Remove all wiki pages from your current collection
coll-load_collection_tooltip: Load this collection as your current collection
coll-remove_this_page: Remove this page from your collection
coll-remove_page_tooltip: Remove the current wiki page from your collection
coll-make_suggestions_tooltip: Show suggestions based on the pages in your collection

Text and image sources, contributors, and licenses
